skillTree.name: Anvil of Doom
skillTree.description: Covered in the Runelord’s ancient script, the anvil has given form to the most powerful runic weapons ever forged.

effects.description: Mount: Anvil of Doom

skillTree.name: Veteran Anvilguard
skillTree.description: Where the Anvil of Doom goes, so too does the Anvilguard, ever loyal and vigilant.

effects.description: Melee attack: +8
Melee defence: +8

skillTree.name: Runemaster
skillTree.description: Upon the Anvil of Doom the rune weapons of legend are forged.

effects.description: Miscast base chance: -15%
Shared cooldown: -15% for all Master Rune Magic

skillTree.name: Greater Locus of Power
skillTree.description: The dense power exuded from the Anvil weighs heavily upon the minds of enemy Wizards.

effects.description: Replaces: "Locus of Power"
Ability: "Greater Locus of Power"

ui_effects.description: ➕Enemy casters within range suffer minor miscast explosion when casting

skillTree.name: Rune of Grimnir
skillTree.description: The endless courage of the Warrior God, directed to bolster this Dawi’s own reserves.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

skillTree.name: Fiery Temper
skillTree.description: When facing a rage like this it's usually safest to run in the opposite direction. And quickly.

effects.description: Attribute: Causes Fear

skillTree.name: Exacting Standards
skillTree.description: "It must be perfect! Anything less is as good as useless!"

skillTree.description: A Runesmith may 'strike the runes' - a metaphor for refusing to let them cool, which reduces their potency.

items.name: Thorek's Rune Armour
items.description: Thorek’s self-crafted armour can turn a Giant’s club, allowing the Runelord to walk unscathed through the flames of the Wyrm Drakamol.

items.name: Klad Brakak
items.description: The runic energy within Thorek's mighty hammer builds and crackles, erupting in an earth-shattering thunderbolt.

factionEffects.title: Masters of the Runes
factionEffects.description: The Master Runelord and his apprentices buoy up the Dwarf battle lines, perpetuating family traditions of craftsmanship to blend magic and metal by use of mighty runes.
